001package fr.aumgn.dac2.exceptions;
002
003import fr.aumgn.dac2.DAC;
004import fr.aumgn.dac2.arena.Arena;
005
006/**
007 * Thrown when trying to start a stage in an incomplete arena.
008 */
009public class IncompleteArena extends DACException {
010
011    private static final long serialVersionUID = -8929105621174257428L;
012
013    public IncompleteArena(DAC dac, Arena arena) {
014        super(dac.getMessages().get("arena.incomplete"));
015    }
016}
